download test files from the validation_tests repo

Source: R/get_tests.R
get_tests.Rd

download test files from the validation_tests repo

Usage

get_tests(pkg, dir = tempdir(), repo = sctotests())

Arguments

pkg

package name as a string

dir

directory to download to

repo

github repository to download from
